titleStmt.title: A defence of the antiquity of the royal line of Scotland with a true account when the Scots were govern'd by kings in the isle of Britain / by Sir George Mackenzie ...
titleStmt.author: Mackenzie, George, Sir, 1636-1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
In reply to Bishop Stillingfleet's Origines britannicae.
